name: GameJam "GB 4 Color" Deep Dive Rescue
description:
Welcome to Deep dive rescue! 

Captain, We have a job for you, and its a vital mission! We have a new breed of cats that are experts at finding Tuna! However, we had a bit of a problem while searching for those juicer goods!

We seemed to have stumbled on an ancient cavern system of some kind with a mysterious fish roaming the tunnels. Our scientists have sent us an emergency distress call that must be answered!

It would help if you journeyed to the depths of the ocean to rescue research scientists. They were studying new types of Tuna, When suddenly mysterious rumbles and growls started to shake the lab's walls! 

They called us to help them quickly and aid them in bringing there work back to the surface! You must go and quickly pick up all the scientists and research they have done before all is lost!

- Controls -

"M" to Mute Music

User Selectable Controls are

AWSD or QZSD + K, L, Enter and Shift - Visuals in the game
D-Pad is AWSD or QZSD
D-Pad to move Submarine 
K or "Button A" to Turn on Light 
L or "Button B" to Deploy Flare

"Enter" or K  "A" to Start.

Note for  HTML5: Mouse is disabled within the game. So make sure your mouse is behind the game  window inside the browser and click if you cant  play.

This is an independently developed project.

Theme was: Gameboy

Bonus Theme: Comedy 

Used Limitations: 4 Colour,  160 x 144 pixels

All Assets, Music and Ideas where created during the jam! Join us on Twitch Weekdays to watch build future jams!
